alert.note: Alert for Brooke; Ohio (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 10:44PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN HARRISON...SOUTH CENTRAL JEFFERSON...EAST CENTRAL GUERNSEY...BELMONT...NORTHEASTERN NOBLE...OHIO...MARSHALL AND BROOKE COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM EDT... At 1044 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Barnesville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wheeling, Moundsville, Martins Ferry, St. Clairsville, Bellaire, Barnesville, Warwood, Bethlehem, West Liberty, Triadelphia, Clearview, Valley Grove, Shadyside, McMechen, Glen Dale, Tiltonsville, Bridgeport, Benwood, Bethesda, and Yorkville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 196 and 225. Interstate 70 in West Virginia between mile markers 0 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for east central Ohio...and northern West Virginia.
